The '''Earth Release: Rock Gun Technique''' is a technique which bullet-sized bits of rock are expelled from the user's mouth with great speed and force. After they are fired, the chunks expand into huge boulders. [[Orochimaru]] stated that when used collaboratively, this technique can most likely destroy a mountain.<ref name="NS374" />
